<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Update or create custom claims for a specific user group

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"items":{"properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"required":["key","value"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"}}},"description":"List of custom claims to set for the user group","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
